original_title: Breve História do Cinema Pornô com Bela Lugosi
overview: Bela Lugosi returns from beyond to present this documentary that investigates the origins of erotic and pornographic cinema, with uncensored images of surviving films, the first erotic films, explicit sex filmed in clandestinity, where they came from and who watched. A curious and interesting work of collages that is very informative.
title: A Brief History of Porn Cinema with Bela Lugosi
